revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Three Essays: on picturesque beauty; on picturesque travels; and on sketching landscape: to which is added a poem, on landscape painting. By William Gilpin, M. A...."
revision.text: Possibly: Three Essays: on picturesque beauty; on picturesque travels; and on sketching landscape: to which is added a poem, on landscape painting. By William Gilpin, M. A. Prebendary of Salisbury; and Vicar of Boldre in New Forest, near Lymington. (London : Printed for R. Blamire, in the Strand, M.DCC.XCII. [1792]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2448556~S1
